QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT DISTINCT A.PROV_ID AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, A.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.FACILITY_HEADER A UNION SELECT DISTINCT B.PROV_ID AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, B.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.OUTPATIENT_SERVICES B UNION SELECT DISTINCT C.PROV_ID AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, C.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.INPATIENT_SERVICES C UNION SELECT DISTINCT D.PROV_ID AS PROVIDER_SOURCE_VALUE, D.STDPROV AS SPECIALTY_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.LONG_TERM_CARE D
